title: Disney, This Is Not the Way To Clean Your Hands; Hazardous hand sanitizers with the Mandalorian and Mickey Mouse brand were recalled
text:
The U.S. Food and Drug Administration says the now-removed product contained benzene. That chemical, which can be absorbed through the skin, could cause life-threatening cancers and blood disorders, the FDA said.

The same outside manufacturer, Best Brands Consumer Products Inc., made Mickey Mouse brand hand sanitizer. It was recalled by the FDA because it contained methanol, which the agency noted can cause nausea, vomiting, headache, blurred vision, blindness or damage to the central nervous system.

And all that can happen before riding "It's a Small World."

Write to Spencer Jakab at spencer.jakab@wsj.com

Disney, This Is Not the Way To Clean Your Hands
